00031 CHPBackgroundZone::CHPBackgroundZone(float x, float y, float bg, float smooth)
00032 {
00033         centerX = x;
00034         centerY = y;
00035         background = bg;
00036         smoothFactor = smooth;
00037 }

00041 void CHPBackgroundZone::Clear() 
00042 {

00044         centerY = 0.0;
00045         background = 0.0;
00046         smoothFactor = 0.0;
00047 }

00049 CHPBackgroundZone CHPBackgroundZone::operator=(CHPBackgroundZone zn)
00050         {
00051                 centerX = zn.GetCenterX(); 
00052                 centerY = zn.GetCenterY(); 
00053                 background = zn.GetBackground();
00054                 smoothFactor = zn.GetSmoothFactor();
00055                 return *this; 
00056         }
